EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_CNW-ProKarma_Omaha_Q416.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Confirmed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-workshop/omaha]]> Thank you for registering for the upcoming Cloud Native Workshop in Omaha. Please see event details below:
Date: Wednesday, November 16, 2016 Time: 10:30 AM - 4:30 PM Location: First National Data Center, 201 N. 16th Street, Omaha, NE 68102
{{my.Save the Date}}
If you have any further questions, please contact Sharath Sahadevan at ssahadevan@pivotal.io <[[mailto:ssahadevan@pivotal.io]]>.
